name: Perspex
tagline: Cross platform .NET UI Framework with bindings and XAML
body:
### News
You can read news about Perspex on [Groky's blog](http://grokys.github.io/)

### Cross Platform
Fow now we can run on Windows, Linux and Mac.
![Mac](http://i.imgur.com/mUbdSKH.png)

### Inspection support
